title: Bug 4971: Unexpected 'copy package' behavior
description: When performing the 'copy package' operation on package viewer in project A, the package 'ui' is unexpectedly included in the destination. The current behavior is not as expected.
OB: After performing the 'copy package' operation, the resulting destination contains a package named 'ui'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new project named xxx. 
2. Open the package viewer in the project. 
3. Select a package in project A. 
4. Right-click on the selected package and choose 'copy' from the context menu.
